title: Crowd of men and women standing, including one in center behind table wearing a dark hat, eyeglasses, earrings, and a dark jacket with geometrically patterned left lapel, gathered in classroom interior with telephone, book shelf, and chalkboard that reads "Whistle a Happy Tune, ...I feel afraid I hold my head erect, whistle a happy tune, ...will suspect I am afraid, ...ivering in my shoes I strike a careless pose, whistle a happy tune, ...ever knows I am afraid, the result of this deception is very strange to tell, for when I fool the people I fear, I fool myself as well, I whistle a happy tune and every single time, the happiness in the tune convinces me that I am not afraid, make believe you're brave and the trick will take you far, be as brave as you make believe you are"
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
